transArray.content:
The hotel is good. Although the room is not big, it has everything you need.
Hygienic and clean, considerate service, breakfast is also OK
There are also flaws, such as the door handle being a bit difficult to pull open and the police being called frequently.
For example, facing the West Fourth Ring Road, with the windows open and noisy,
But when you close the window curtains, it's very quiet
In short, it is recommended to stay

Dear guest, thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and giving such a comprehensive and positive recognition. Your comfort during your stay is our always striving goal. As you said, part of the hotel's street frontage uses double-layer soundproof windows. It can effectively reduce the intrusion of noise. The room door lock has hidden usage tips. Pull it back and push it back to open it. Thank you again for your affirmation of the service and hygienic breakfast. All the hotel staff look forward to your every visit. Wish you the best. all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
